de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.logging.statistics

Interface Counter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Statistic
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtomicLongCounter, UnsynchronizedLongCounter

    public interface Counter
extends Statistic
    Simple statistic by counting. For example: invocations of a method.

    • Method Summary
